attributes.action: investigate the appalling tratment i am receiving from  worthing hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: As a personal case, this is more suitable for direct communication with the Department of Health.  You can write to them at The Department of Health, Richmond House, 79 Whitehall, London SW1A 2NS.  You can also contact them by telephone on 0207 210 4850.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
